instructions_to_main_agent: FORCE DARK MODE: Ensure the `html` tag has the `dark` class by default. The entire site is dark-themed.
NO GRADIENT TEXT: Do not use gradient text for headings. Use solid white or the primary cyan for emphasis.
LINEAR STYLE: Implement the 'Linear' design philosophy - clean lines, high contrast, subtle borders, and focus on typography.
ANIMATIONS: Use `framer-motion` for scroll reveals. Elements should fade in and slide up slightly as they enter the viewport.
NAVIGATION: Create a floating, glassmorphism navbar that sticks to the top with a blur effect.
TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, links, inputs).
FONTS: Import 'Outfit' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in `index.css`.
NO TRANSPARENT BG: Ensure dropdowns, modals, and sticky headers have a solid or blurred background (never transparent) to prevent text overlap issues.
CALENDLY: Use `react-calendly` for the consultation booking section.
CHATBOT: Create a floating action button (FAB) for the AI Chatbot that expands into a chat window.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic centered layouts, overuse of purple/teal gradients).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do not apply universal transitions (e.g., `transition: all`).
Do not center align the app container globally.
Use named exports for components and default exports for pages.
